title: Khumariyaan electrifies Lok Mela 2024
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 11 (APP):Lok Mela 2024, a vibrant celebration of Pakistan’s rich folk heritage, reached new heights with a captivating performance by the renowned band Khumariyaan on the Golden Jubilee celebrations night of Lok Virsa.
The event, hosted by Lok Virsa, at its open-air theater, beamed with the nation’s diverse traditions, music, and arts.
Khumariyaan, known for their soulful melodies and energetic performances, captivated the audience with their signature blend of traditional and contemporary sounds.
Their music echoed with the crowd, creating an unforgettable evening filled with fun, joy, and cultural pride. The International Pavilion at Lok Mela 2024 added an international flavor to the festivities.
The visitors had the opportunity to experience the cultures of Saudi Arabia, Indonesia, Uzbekistan, and Turkey. The pavilion featured captivating displays of traditional attire, handicrafts, and culinary delights from these countries.
This annual cultural extravaganza, being held from November 8-17 at the Mela Grounds of Lok Virsa, exhibits the diverse tapestry of Pakistan’s heritage through a captivating display of traditional arts, crafts, music, dance, and cuisine.
This year’s Lok Mela offered a unique opportunity for visitors to immerse themselves in the rich cultural heritage of Pakistan’s various regions.
